name: VOiD
description: In this epic quest you must reach the end by going through black holes. Try to avoid all the traps, solve all the mind-bending puzzles and escape form the powerful bosses. OH... And one more thing .... secrets are everywhere.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
